room_title: Escape room "T'Was The Night Before Christmas" by 59: Escape Adventures in Post Falls
review: Came here with a group from work and again with a group of friends. Both experiences were fantastic. This is such a fun and very well run game with tons of cool features. It is a fantastic team builder and something everyone will remember for a long time. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "T'Was The Night Before Christmas" by 59: Escape Adventures in Post Falls
review: We did this as a work event to build teamwork. So much fun and definitely challenging. The staff were helpful and friendly. The place is very clean and the puzzle was well thought out. We did the Christmas one. I highly recommend this. I will be coming back for sure!
